overview: The search for an accused youngster leads a policeman to a little village on the edge of forest. Subsequent chase deep into the forest leaves the cop badly injured. In a twist of fate, the hunted turns into savior for the hunter as the young man nurses the cop to health, feeding him and treating him with medicinal herbs from the forest itself.  Away from the civilized world, in nature's soothing lap, the cop finds a new meaning to compassion, humanity and  equality beyond the scope of justice; a revelation that will transform him forever.
title: The Fragrant Woods
